title: Winchell's Donut House with Mike Horowitz
itunes:title: Winchell's Donut House with Mike Horowitz
description:
Mike Horowitz (Prison Break, Burn Notice, Turner & Hooch) joins the 'boys to discuss eating on set and breakfast burritos before a review of Winchell's Donut House. Plus, A Taco Bell edition of Jingle All The Whey.

Sources for the week's intro:

https://www.nytimes.com/1961/10/15/archives/foul-claim-fails-donut-king-91-wins-aqueducts-206800-champagne-by.html

https://www.bloodhorse.com/horse-racing/features/tapits-world-224760

https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-2002-nov-28-me-winchell28-story.html

https://lasvegassun.com/news/2002/nov/29/doughnut-chain-founder-winchell-dies-at-lv-home/

https://startupsapience.medium.com/the-rise-and-fall-of-winchells-donut-3c3236b7370f

https://winchells.com/about

Commercials featured in the Jingle All The Whey segment:

The Works

Taco Bell Rancho Burrito

The Fresh Food Place

Run For The Border

$.49 Tacos! 

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
